refnamediv.refname: RSA_print, RSA_print_fp, DSAparams_print, DSAparams_print_fp, DSA_print, DSA_print_fp, DHparams_print, DHparams_print_fp

refsynopsisdiv.synopsis: int RSA_print(BIO *bp, RSA *x, int offset); int RSA_print_fp(FILE *fp, RSA *x, int offset);
int DHparams_print(BIO *bp, DH *x); int DHparams_print_fp(FILE *fp, DH *x);

refsection.title: DESCRIPTION
refsection.para: A human-readable hexadecimal output of the components of the RSA key, DSA parameters or key or DH parameters is printed to bp or fp.
The output lines are indented by offset spaces.

refsection.title: RETURN VALUES
refsection.para: These functions return 1 on success, 0 on error.

refsection.title: HISTORY
refsection.para: RSA_print(), RSA_print_fp(), DSA_print(), DSA_print_fp(), DH_print(), DH_print_fp() are available in all versions of SSLeay and OpenSSL. DSAparams_print() and DSAparams_print_fp() were added in SSLeay 0.8.
